src:
„Žralok“ Kane má na krku žalobu, kasínu dlhuje pol milióna dolárov
07 Nov 2019, 06:35 by Webnoviny
7.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Kasíno v americkom Las Vegas podalo žalobu na hokejového útočníka Evandera Kanea, ktorý mu od apríla 2019 dlhuje 500-tisíc amerických dolárov.
Kanadská ofenzívna hviezda klubu zámorskej NHL San Jose Sharks mala spomenuté prostriedky minúť na hazard počas minulosezónneho play-off, v ktorom Sharks postúpili cez miestnych Vegas Golden Knights.
Viac k témam: hazard, kasíno, NHL, play-off NHL, žalobaZdroj: Webnoviny.sk – „Žralok“ Kane má na krku žalobu, kasínu dlhuje pol milióna dolárov © SITA Všetky práva vyhradené.
text:
"Shark" Kane has a lawsuit on her neck, the casino owes half a million dollars
07 Nov 2019, 06:35 by Webnoviny
7/11/2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - Las Vegas casino has filed a lawsuit against hockey striker Evander Kane, who owes him $ 500,000 since April 2019.
The Canadian offensive star of the overseas NHL club, San Jose Sharks, had the money spent on gambling during a playoff season last season, in which the Sharks advanced through the local Vegas Golden Knights.
More on topics: gambling, casino, NHL, NHL playoffs, lawsuitSource: Webnoviny.sk - "Shark" Kane has a lawsuit against the neck, the casino owes half a million dollars © SITA All rights reserved.
